note.p: Clergyman. Born in Quebec, Canada. BA, Oxford (Exeter College), 1845. Perpetual curate, Netherfield, Sussex, 1859; rector of Saint Andrew with Saint Mary Bredman, Canterbury, 1865–77; rector of Keston, Kent, 1877–81.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 30 September 2015)
Quebec, vital and church records (Drouin collection) 1621–1968 (Ancestry.com, accessed 30 September 2015)
